org.apache.ignite.mxbean

Interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataStorageMetrics
    Deprecated. 
    Check the JmxMetricExporterSpi with "name=io.datastorage" instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean
extends DataStorageMetrics
    An MX bean allowing to monitor and tune persistence metrics.
    See Also:
    ReadOnlyMetricManager, ReadOnlyMetricRegistry, JmxMetricExporterSpi, MetricExporterSpi

    • Method Detail

      • getWalLoggingRate

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Average number of WAL records per second written during the last time interval.")
float getWalLoggingRate()
        Deprecated. 
        Specified by:
        getWalLoggingRate in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Returns:
        The average number of WAL records per second written during the last time interval.

        The length of time interval is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property. The number of subintervals is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.

      • getWalWritingRate

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Average number of bytes per second written during the last time interval.")
float getWalWritingRate()
        Deprecated. 
        Specified by:
        getWalWritingRate in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Returns:
        The average number of bytes per second written during the last time interval. The length of time interval is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property. The number of subintervals is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Current number of WAL segments in the WAL archive.")

        Deprecated. 
        Specified by:
        getWalArchiveSegments in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Returns:
        The current number of WAL segments in the WAL archive.

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Average WAL fsync duration in microseconds over the last time interval.")
float getWalFsyncTimeAverage()
        Deprecated. 
        Specified by:
        getWalFsyncTimeAverage in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Returns:
        The average WAL fsync duration in microseconds over the last time interval.

        The length of time interval is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property. The number of subintervals is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.

      • rateTimeInterval

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Sets time interval for pages allocation and eviction monitoring purposes.")
 @Deprecated
void rateTimeInterval(@MXBeanParameter(name="rateTimeInterval",description="Time interval (in milliseconds) to set.")
                                                                                                                                         long rateTimeInterval)
        Deprecated. Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
        Sets time interval for rate-based metrics. Identical to setting DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property.
        Parameters:
        rateTimeInterval - Time interval (in milliseconds) used for allocation and eviction rates calculations.

      • subIntervals

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Sets a number of sub-intervals to calculate allocation and eviction rates metrics.")
 @Deprecated
void subIntervals(@MXBeanParameter(name="subInts",description="Number of subintervals to set.")
                                                                                                                                              int subInts)
        Deprecated. Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
        Sets a number of sub-intervals the whole rateTimeInterval(long) will be split into to calculate rate-based metrics. Identical to setting DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.
        Parameters:
        subInts - A number of sub-intervals.

      • getStorageSize

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Storage space allocated, in bytes.")
long getStorageSize()
        Deprecated. 
        Storage space allocated in bytes.
        Specified by:
        getStorageSize in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Returns:
        Storage space allocated in bytes.

      • getSparseStorageSize

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Storage space allocated adjusted for possible sparsity, in bytes.")
long getSparseStorageSize()
        Deprecated. 
        Storage space allocated adjusted for possible sparsity in bytes. May produce unstable or even incorrect result on some file systems (e.g. XFS). Known to work correctly on Ext4 and Btrfs.
        Specified by:
        getSparseStorageSize in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Returns:
        Storage space allocated adjusted for possible sparsity in bytes or negative value is not supported.

      • getWalWrittenBytes

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Getting the total number of logged bytes into the WAL.")

        Returns:
